Depreciated function of btb_smooth

Source: R/kernelSmoothing.R
kernelSmoothing.Rd

Function kernelSmoothing has been replaced by btb_smooth

Usage

kernelSmoothing(
  dfObservations,
  sEPSG,
  iCellSize,
  iBandwidth,
  vQuantiles = NULL,
  dfCentroids = NULL,
  fUpdateProgress = NULL,
  iNeighbor = NULL,
  iNbObsMin = 250
)

Arguments

dfObservations

points

sEPSG

epsg code

iCellSize

cell size

iBandwidth

smoothing bandwidth

vQuantiles

quantiles

dfCentroids

user grid

fUpdateProgress

message parameter

iNeighbor

number of neighbors pixels

iNbObsMin

technical parameter

Value

a warning message
